name: GameofQuestions
0:
”Alexa, open Game of Questions”
”Alexa, play Game of Questions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game of questions
des:
With this skill, you'll be able to play a general knowledge quiz with your Alexa. Each quiz will be of 10 questions and for every correct answer, you'll be awarded one point.
Questions asked in the quiz are based on popular topics going all around the Globe. The questions will be updated on a regular basis. This Alexa skill will help you in strengthening your General Knowledge as you'll get to learn new things. 
Enable this skill in your Alexa account and start this skill by asking Alexa, "Alexa, Open Game of Questions".
Keep Learning!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
